message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15000?
Bob, I understand your position. While I'm happy to work with you, I'm not able to go down to $15000 just yet.  I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $17500.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but I'm still aiming to keep the cost within $15000. Could we perhaps reach a compromise at $16000?
